propDescriptions.componentsProps: The props used for each component slot.
propDescriptions.defaultValue: The default value. Use when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.direction: Defines the flex-direction style property. It is applied for all screen sizes.
propDescriptions.disableFuture: If true disable values after the current date for date components, time for time components and both for date time components.
propDescriptions.disablePast: If true disable values before the current date for date components, time for time components and both for date time components.
propDescriptions.divider: Add an element between each child.
propDescriptions.format: Format of the date when rendered in the input(s).
propDescriptions.onChange:
Callback fired when the value changes.

Signature:
function(value: TValue, The: FieldChangeHandlerContext<TError>) => void
value: The new value.
The: context containing the validation result of the current value.
propDescriptions.onError:
Callback fired when the error associated to the current value changes.

Signature:
function(error: TError, value: TValue) => void
error: The new error.
value: The value associated to the error.
propDescriptions.onSelectedSectionsChange:
Callback fired when the selected sections change.

Signature:
function(newValue: FieldSelectedSections) => void
newValue: The new selected sections.
propDescriptions.readOnly: It prevents the user from changing the value of the field (not from interacting with the field).
propDescriptions.selectedSections: The currently selected sections. This prop accept four formats: 1. If a number is provided, the section at this index will be selected. 2. If an object with a startIndex and endIndex properties are provided, the sections between those two indexes will be selected. 3. If a string of type MuiDateSectionName is provided, the first section with that name will be selected. 4. If null is provided, no section will be selected If not provided, the selected sections will be handled internally.
propDescriptions.shouldDisableDate:
Disable specific date. @DateIOType

Signature:
function(day: TDate, position: string) => boolean
day: The date to test.
position: The date to test, 'start' or 'end'.
returns (boolean): Returns true if the date should be disabled.
propDescriptions.spacing: Defines the space between immediate children.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop, which allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
propDescriptions.value: The selected value. Used when the component is controlled.

slotDescriptions.Input: Input rendered for the start or end date.
slotDescriptions.Separator: Element rendered between the two inputs.
